head.script: $(document).ready(function() { $("a").each(function() { var i = $(this).attr("href"); var n = i.replace(http://www.alienshanu.me/, "https://www.alienshanu.me/"); $(this).attr("href", function() { return n }) }) });

div.style: clear: both; float: left; margin-bottom:5px; margin-right: 1em;-moz-border-radius: 10px; -webkit-border-radius: 10px; border-radius: 10px; border-radius: 10px;border:double 4px #ddd;box-shadow:inset 0 0 30px #fff;
font-weight: bold; left: 30%; top: 50%; width: 100%; z-index: 3;

height: 100%; right: 500%; top: 180%; visibility: hidden; width: 100%;

height: 100%; left: 300%; top: 300%; visibility: hidden; width: 100%;
